thread.section_title: Better Life Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Life | www.cleanhappens.com
thread.title: Sara

author: Sara
title: Sara
text:
I can't recommend their products more!
The stainless steel polish is the best I've ever used and you don't have to be perfect using it to get great results.
The kitchen bath scrubber liquid takes all the weird sink stain off the bottom of my white porcelain sink that all the scrubbing in the world doesn't remove.
The wood cleaner, I love,love. It works great and doesn't leave weird slick surface or oily residue, it's also my favorite scent wise that they do! Smells like the holidays.
The whatever and granite cleaner are better than those toxic ones and have amazing scents.
We also use the laundry detergent in lavender citrus and we have beautifully clean great smelling clothes and upon switching it doesn't irritate my boyfriends skin like others with perfumes and dyes that we used to use.
I use so many products I can't say enough great things. My only complaint, well it's not really a complaint more of a suggestion or two is,
The smell of the floor cleaner and names of the products. I miss the fun labels and names, now the labels graphics and fun names like simply floored, Oakey doakey , einshine, take it for granite and whatever cleaner are gone and have generic counter parts. As for the smell of the floor cleaner, I wish I had another option, I'm not a big fan of the mint smell and wish it had more of a bright citrus smell with lavender or bergamot. It works great
I just don't like the smell. But it's all I use on our floors despite not liking the smell, that should tell you something!
